# Tailwind CSS Design System Principles

## Color System
- Supports dark mode and system color schemes
- Uses color tokens like 'oklch(.13 .028 261.692)' for precise color definition
- Provides flexible color adaptation across different themes

## Typography
- Comprehensive font control utilities:
  - Font family, size, weight, style
  - Letter spacing, line height
  - Text alignment, transformation
  - Responsive text scaling

## Spacing
- Utility-based spacing system
- Consistent padding and margin controls
- Grid and flexbox layout utilities
- Responsive design considerations

## Responsive Design
- Mobile-first approach
- Breakpoint-aware utilities
- Adaptive layout techniques
- Flexible grid and flexbox systems

## Key Design Principles
- "It's fast, flexible, and reliable â€” with zero-runtime"
- Utility-first CSS methodology
- Comprehensive, composable design tokens
- Seamless theme and color scheme transitions

The system emphasizes modularity, allowing granular control while maintaining a cohesive design language across different screen sizes and contexts.
